Sentencas: A cost-effective method was developed to fabricate dense doped LaCrO(3) bases interconnect membrane on anode substrate for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications.
Titulo: A novel approach to co-sintering of doped lanthanum chromite interconnect on Ni-YSZ anode substrate for SOFC applications

Sentencas: As conventional lanthanum chromite interconnect is difficult to be co-sintered with green anode, a simple and cost effective screen printing/co-sintering process was employed, and dense La(1-x-y)Sr(x)Ca(y)CrO(3-delta) interconnect membrane was successfully prepared on the anode support of NiO-YSZ.
Titulo: A novel approach to co-sintering of doped lanthanum chromite interconnect on Ni-YSZ anode substrate for SOFC applications

Sentencas: In this method a base layer of doped lanthanum chromite (La(1-x)Sr(x)CrO(3-delta)) was applied on NiO-YSZ substrate and a top layer of CaCrO(4) was then coated and co-sintered to melt the top layer.
Titulo: A novel approach to co-sintering of doped lanthanum chromite interconnect on Ni-YSZ anode substrate for SOFC applications

Sentencas: By means of this method, not only CaCrO(4) melts and fills the open pores in the base layer, but it also dissolves in base layer forming La(1-x-y)Sr(x)Ca(y)CrO(3-delta) as a single layer.
Titulo: A novel approach to co-sintering of doped lanthanum chromite interconnect on Ni-YSZ anode substrate for SOFC applications

Sentencas: The sintering characteristics, microstructure and electrical conductivity of interconnect were investigated.
Titulo: A novel approach to co-sintering of doped lanthanum chromite interconnect on Ni-YSZ anode substrate for SOFC applications

Sentencas: In addition, the effects of composition on sintering and electrical properties were studied.
Titulo: A novel approach to co-sintering of doped lanthanum chromite interconnect on Ni-YSZ anode substrate for SOFC applications
A novel approach to co-sintering of doped lanthanum chromite interconnect on Ni-YSZ anode substrate for SOFC applications
